Entries.default: Rising from the fungus at uneven intervals are fleshy, nipple-like pustules.

You collect some of the mold, and your hand comes away damp from a ruptured pustule.

It immediately begins to itch.
With deft care, you slice free a few of the pustules without rupturing any.
You easily collect a sample of the mold, pustules and all.
A slick mold clings to the wall. Moisture beads its surface.
